title: Collection
description: Collection information and the its set of strains

operativeUnit.description: Operative Unit that own the collection.

contactName.description: The name of the person to be contact for the collection.

contactEmail.description: The email of the person to be contact for the collection.

institution.description: The institution that own the collection.

strains.description: List of strains possesed by the collection.

Strain.title: Strain
Strain.description: The information about the strain characteristics. The mandatory fields are {ccAccessionNumber, taxonName, organismType}.

otherDenominations.description: Unofficial names that are often used for the strain, e.g. in publications, or a name given to the strain by the isolator before its deposit at the collection.

literature.description: Recommended readings related to this strain, identifier of the literature item.

taxonName.description: The taxon name of the strain.

riskGroup.description: Risk group according to EU Directive 2000/54/EC and its amendments and corrections.

dualUse.description: Specify whether the strain has the potential for a harmful use according to EU Council Regulation 2000/1334/CE and its amendments and corrections.

euQuarantine.description: Specify whether the strain is subject to quarantine according to European Directive 2000/29/CE and its amendments and corrections. The list of quarantine organisms is available in the Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2019/2072.

sexualState.description: Information on strain sexual state / mating type, for relevant resource types.

gmo.description: Specify whether the strain is a Genetically Modified Organism (GMO).

gmoConstructionInfo.description: Information on the construction of the GMO.

nagoyaConditions.description: Situation of the strain in relation to the Nagoya protocol. One of the allowed values: 1 ('No known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol'), 2 ('Documents providing proof of legal access and terms of use available at the collection'), 3 ('Strain probably in scope, please contact the culture collection').

useRestrictions.description: Report if the strain can be used for commercial development or not: 1 (no restrictions apply), 2 (for research use only), 3 (for commercial development a special agreement is requested).

formOfSupply.description: The list of forms of supply of the strain by the collection.

recommendedGrowthTemperature.description: The recommended growing temperature for the strain. The temperature is expressed in Celsius degrees.

testedGrowthTemperatureRange.description: The lowest and the highest temperature at which the strain was tested for growing. Temperatures are expressed in Celsius degrees.
